name: chromatica-monorepo
description: Chromatica - Monorepo with mobile app and Express API

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run type-check
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:mobile
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm -w @chromatica/mobile run test:watch" "npm -w @chromatica/api run test:watch" "npm -w admin run test:watch"
scripts.lint: npm -w @chromatica/mobile run lint && npm -w @chromatica/api run lint && npm -w admin run lint
